knimeNode.name: GIS View
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides visualization of locations with latitude and longitude.

fullDescription.intro: This station can visualize a geographical map with certain locations. The geographical map is read from the shape table in first port. The input table in the second port must contain the locations coordinates (latitude and longitude). Any other data in the input table can be used for highlighting (as explained below).

ports.inPort: Table with station coordinates and data.
